description:
Kids and adults alike will love this Toilet Trouble Game. Share some hilarious and suspense-filled moments as players take turns spinning the toilet paper roll, flushing the toilet handle, and hoping they don't get sprayed with water! The number that turns up on the paper roll spinner dictates how many times each player must flush. Players are safe if they hear the flushing sound, but no water is sprayed. Who knows which flush will be the one that sprays water, eliminating that player? Continue taking turns spinning the roll and flushing until one player has not been sprayed. That player wins the game! To ensure the game is ready prior to playing, please flush the handle several times until water begins to spray.

transcript: This Christmas, cater to your little one's creativity with Nintendo Labo. They could be stepping into the shoes of a concert pianist. Or perhaps sailing the high seas, casting the line and reeling in a huge shark. Or maybe they'll experience the joy of caring for a magical creature in a real house. Nintendo Labo, only on Nintendo Switch.
title: Nintendo Labo Toy-Con 01: Variety Kit - Trailer - Smyths Toys
description:
A new way to play. Nintendo Labo. By assembling sheets of cardboard into a variety of shapes called Toy-Con, and combining them with Nintendo Switch, you can bring them to life! Nintendo Labo lets anyone pick up and enjoy making, playing and discovering. With the Variety Kit, you can create many different Toy-Con, including Toy-Con RC Car, Toy-Con Fishing Rod, Toy-Con House, Toy-Con Motorbike and Toy-Con Piano.

These items are included: Nintendo Switch game card containing software for use with Variety Kit, Cardboard sheet x28, Reflective sheet x3, Sponge sheet x3, String (orange) x1, String (blue) x1, Eyelet set (grey) x1, Eyelet set (blue) x4, Rubber band (large) x2, Rubber band (small) x6.

Players can now play Mario Kart 8 Deluxe in TV mode using the Toy-Con Motorbike, or insert the Nintendo Switch console directly into the Motorbike’s dashboard to play it on-the-go. Whether using Toy-Con Motorbike or any of the other supported controllers, additional driving options such as Smart Steering and auto-accelerate are available to help newcomers get back on track. Mario Kart 8 Deluxe is the first game outside of Nintendo Labo software to receive Toy-Con support, and more titles will be compatible with Nintendo Labo in the future.

In Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, familiar characters from the Super Mario series compete in races set around the world of the Mushroom Kingdom and beyond. Start your engines, put the pedal to the metal, and get ready for the kind of thrilling racing action that only Mario Kart can provide.

Meanwhile, the search for Europe’s greatest Nintendo Labo creations and customisations has begun with the launch of the Nintendo Labo Creators Contest for Europe. Whether you’re a master inventor or a creative spirit, anyone can take part and have a chance to win some amazing prizes, including a special Nintendo Switch system. For this contest, entrants can submit their creations in three different categories:

Creations: Got an idea for your own original Toy-Con creation? Grab some cardboard sheets, dive into Toy-Con Garage and see where your creativity takes you – the sky’s the limit. Customisations: Break out the pens, paints, stickers, stencils and anything you can find, and show us your one-of-a-kind customised Toy- Con designs.

Kids: In this category, children up to the age of 12 can submit an original Toy-Con creation or customisation. You can even get some help from a parent or guardian.

Submissions will start on the Nintendo Labo website on 19th July and close on 7th September, but entrants can start preparing right now.

Purchase Nintendo Labo Toy-Con 01: Variety Kit in Smyths Toys Superstores NOW:
https://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/video-games-and-tablets/nintendo-gaming/nintendo-labo/nintendo-labo-toy-con-01-variety-kit/p/165247

title: Ravensburger 3D Jigsaw - Smyths Toys
description:
The Volkswagen T1 Camper Van (Surfer Edition) now comes as a 3D puzzle! With 162 plastic pieces and accessories, you can piece together your very own VW Camper and display it in any room. As an official Volkswagen licensed product, this highly-detailed model is an perfect for collectors and puzzle enthusiasts. High quality 162 piece plastic jigsaw puzzle. description:
With this Thomas & Friends Take-n-Play Jungle Quest Track Set Thomas is on an amazing adventure in search of the legendary lost emerald. He must get past the gorilla guardian first! Your child can help Thomas the Tank Engine on his quest to find this rare artefact.

Just send Thomas down the track and press the handle. Press it three times to bring Thomas to the top of the playset, where Thomas comes face-to-fearsome face with the gorilla! When Thomas reaches the top, the emerald drops down and lands in the gorilla’s hand. Thomas can race down the platform after the treasure but as he approaches, the gorilla hand grabs the emerald and pulls it out of reach!

After playing out the thrilling adventure, children can also flip the set around for more jungle action. Ride Thomas through the vines. As the river platform is tipped, the treasure rolls onto the tracks. Help Thomas push the treasure along the tracks and onto the rear lifting track. Push the handle 3 times and Thomas rides to the top of the play set again, to the back of the gorilla head. Have Thomas and the treasure ride through the gorilla head and down the rope bridge track back to safety.

description:

DRIVE THE FUTURE - What makes Anki Overdrive the world's most intelligent battle racing system? Tech so advanced, it feels like the future. Each Supercar is a self-aware robot, driven by powerful artificial intelligence (A.I.) and equipped with deadly strategy. Whatever track you build, they'll learn it. Control them with your smart device and take down opponents with an array of weapons, from plasma cannons to flame throwers. It’s pulse-pounding play, made possible through state-of- the-art tech and it's an experience unlike anything else.

transcript: AquaDragon! Create your own adventures with AquaDragon Sea Friends. Just make them hatch by adding water, AquaDragon eggs, and in a few days... Wow! Feed them and see their adventures in their underwater world. There's loads of different tanks. Choose your own. AquaDragon!
title: Smyths Toys - Aqua Dragons Sea Friends Octopus Garden
description:
Aqua Dragons are real live aquatic creatures that you can hatch and grow at home. The Sea Friends Octopus Garden is a full colour supersized tank and has twice as many eggs as our usual Aqua Dragons items, for double the hatching fun. With built in bubble pump to oxygenate the water, eggs, food and spoon. Just follow the full instructions, add water and they miraculously hatch within just 2-3 days. Initially your hatchlings will be microscopic but within 5-7 days you should be able to see them. They are fascinating to watch as they swim and play graciously in their aquatic underwater world.

The Aqua Dragons Sea Friends Octopus Garden includes an invite to download the free Aqua Dragons Investigator App with augmented reality, a game and educational content.

AQUA DRAGONS FAQ

1. Are they really alive? Yes, the Artemia salina (which is the scientific name for what we call Aqua Dragons) are live organisms and they need you to care for them.

2. What temperature should the water be? The ideal water temperature range for hatching is 21 to 27ºC. It is important that the water is at this temperature in order for your Aqua Dragons to hatch and during the first delicate week of life.

3. How many Aqua Dragons should hatch? A difficult question; it depends on the water, the temperature, the number of microscopic eggs that were in the packet, so could be between 10 and 50.

4. Do I have to change the water? No, the water has a special ph and salinity level that is established by the contents of the eggs sachet. So don’t change the water! However the water does evaporate so you can fill up, slowly using room temperature bottled spring water in small quantities each time. Do not use tap water.

5. How do I oxygenate the water? We recommend that you shake the water before adding the eggs so that it is oxygenated well from the start then begin using the pipette to oxygenate the water. Squeeze and release the pipette to let air into the chamber. Put the pipette tip in the water and then squeeze again to blow the stored air into the water. Repeat this for 30 seconds every few days.

6. How often should I feed my Aqua Dragons? The amount you feed should correspond to the number of Aqua Dragons you hatch. If you have only a few Aqua Dragons, feed every 4-5 days. If you have a large hatch of 20+ Aqua Dragons feed every other day.

7. Do Aqua Dragons like sunlight? Yes they love it, just make sure you don’t leave them in the direct sun where the water would overheat!

8. Do Aqua Dragons bite? No... actually they don’t have a mouth; they eat through their wings which work like gills.

9. How long do Aqua Dragons live? Each Aqua Dragon can reach adult hood at one month and can live for up to 90 days, however if you care for them well you may see that they reproduce so you could have life in the tank for much longer.

10. How big do Aqua Dragons grow? Up to 20mm but this may take up to two months.

11. What do I do if one of the dragons dies? When an Aqua Dragon dies it will float down to the bottom of your habitat and slowly biodegrade. In effect they become part of the habitat so it is not necessary to remove them.

12. Initially I had lots of hatchlings but now I am left with just a few adults? Not all the Aqua Dragons that hatch will survive into adulthood, otherwise we´d be overrun! It´s normal and natural for many to hatch and for only some to make it through to adulthood.

13. The water is dirty, what do I do? This is normally due to over- feeding.

Buy online at http://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/creativity-music-partyware/c-553/science-sets/p-17913/aqua-dragons-sea-friends-octopus-garden/

transcript: From wild science comes Weird Slime Lab! A complete box of experiments to create squirming blood clots, slimy slippery tadpoles, handfuls of rat's gizzards, wriggling green worms, and putty that goes... Just stir, squeeze, drop, dribble and scoop your way to sliminess! Collect them all at all great places!
title: Wild Science Weird Slime Goo Lab - Smyths Toys
description:
Unleash the goo with the Wild Science Weird Slime Goo Lab! Kids can make slime balls, ghastly guts and gizzards, giant blood clots and more, all while learning about the science behind the most gruesome special effects.

Master ion diffusion and polymer reactions to create your own drippy slimes and bouncy gels! The Wild Science Weird Slime Goo Lab includes 8 activities, each building on the skills learned in the last. So don your safety goggles and get ready to get gross.

With the Wild Science Weird Slime Goo Lab, you can create dozens of popping fish eggs, grow some gruesome colourful tape worms and even pickle some realistic rat gizzards. Horrify your friends with floating eyeballs in a jar! Discover the slimy secrets of fart putty and exploding slugs. Goo-some experiments let you make a shoal of jelly tadpoles, some invisible ghostly jellyfish, slimy leeches and so much more. This is polymer chemistry like never before!

Each Wild Science Weird Slime Goo Lab comes with an easy-to-follow colour instruction manual and contains enough material to repeat experiments. This fun and easy-to-clean-up kit is perfect for creative kids—and for parents who want them to explore the world without blowing it up.

Buy online at https://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/wild-science/wild-science-weird-slime-goo-lab/p/164961

description:
Science Museum Mechanics Laboratory
The Science Museum Mechanics Laboratory is an extremely well-equipped laboratory where the principles of mechanics and engineering can be learned in an entertaining way. It is even possible to build a helicopter, a motorised crane and a car with an electric engine in which a child can move the gear stick and steering wheel!

Cyber Robot

For Technology fans, Clementoni brings you a brand new and unique scientific kit with which to assemble a real robot, equipped with a Bluetooth module and as many as 4 play modes! Using the FREE app for tablet and smartphones developed by Clementoni you can programme the robots movements, lighting effects and sound effects!

Using your device, you will be able to display a simulation of the programmed command as it is being executed and you will also be able to control the robot in real time, as if you were using a remote control! Alternatively, the robots route can beset manually through an electronic card with buttons.

The included manual provides a wealth of information on robotics and electronics and will be an excellent educational tool for your little scientist. The concept, design, development and manufacturing of this product are done entirely by Clementoni in Italy.

The Cyber Robot comes with energy-saving Bluetooth technology , which is only compatible with certain devices This means the APP will only work on the following smartphones and tablets

Apple iPhone 4S and later iPad 3 and later iPad Air and and later iPad mini 1 and later iPod touch 5th Generation and later

Android All devices with BLE and Android 4.3 software (and later)

Bounce 'em in for the win! The Connect 4 Shots game is fast-paced, rapid-fire fun in a race to get 4 shots in a row! Count down to start: 1-2-3…bounce! Two players bounce the lightweight, colourful balls into the grid at the same time. Remember, the balls must hit the table before going in. Keep bouncing balls until a player gets 4 in a row of their colour for the win. If players have bounced all the balls into the grid but neither got 4 in a row, bounce the tiebreaker orange ball to determine the winner. Then when the game is over, fold the grid into a handy storage case.

Buy online at https://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/games-puzzles-and-books/board-games/family-board-games/connect-4-shots-game/p/169542

transcript: Hey parents! Check out this fun toy from Hasbro!
title: Smyths Toys - Nerf Modulus Regulator
description:
Build a blaster for any mission with the fully motorised Nerf Modulus Regulator! SwitchFire Technology lets kids choose from 3 firing modes, so you can be ready for any battle.

The Nerf Modulus Regulator is the perfect blaster for missions that require both accuracy and intense blasting action. Flip the switch to choose single-fire mode and launch 1 dart with precision and power at each trigger pull. When it’s time for the real battle, select burst- fire mode to blast several darts with each pull of the trigger, or switch to continuous-fire to launch an uninterrupted stream of darts at your opponents.

Load up both 12-dart clips, one for the blaster and the other for the storage stock. Hold down the acceleration button to power up the motor, and then let the darts fly! The indicator light blinks to alert battlers when the clip is empty, so you can quickly switch the full clip from the stock to the blaster and keep on blasting.

Customise your Nerf Modulus Regulator blaster with the included swivel handle to stabilise your shots. The 2 versatile barrel-scopes can be used as barrel extensions or targeting scopes to optimise your blasts. Expand the customising options with Nerf Modulus accessories and upgrade kits (each sold separately).

The Nerf Modulus Regulator includes a blaster, short barrel-scope, long barrel-scope, storage stock, handle, two 12-dart clips, 24 darts and instructions.

There's one that's so for you, and there's one that's so for me. Don't forget the potpourri. Perfume Laboratory, it's wild! And here's another great idea from...
title: Perfume Factory - Smyths Toys
description:
Explore the science of perfume with the Wild Science Perfume Factory. This fun-filled set has everything kids need to filter and customise their own perfumes, just like in a real lab.

Blend your own secret formulas to create a perfume that’s just right. The Wild Science Perfume Factory comes with 5 gift vials and an atomiser bottle, along with enough base ingredients to refill your perfume vials over and over again. Create and label perfumes for friends, design new scents at sleepovers, or just experiment for fun.

The Wild Science Perfume Factory comes with a syringe to help you measure out your formulas, and a pressure-producing filter pump to extract the scent. Each of the 4 base perfumes represents a different note used in perfume design. Discover how the volatility of the oil affects scent, and how shaking and increased pressure emulsifies oils in water to create an eau de parfum. Learn to remove fine fibres with pressure filtration, just like in a real lab. This is science witattitude.

The 4 base perfumes come on die cut, pre-measured absorbent sample cards, with all the equipment you need to customise your own scents and create perfumed gel potpourri to make your room smell divine. There’s even a beautiful stained glass bottle for your favourite scent and a pretty pink display unit.

Buy online at: https://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/creativity-music-and-partyware/science-sets/perfume-factory/p/173929

title: Wild Science Lava Lamp and Glitter Tube Factory - Smyths Toys
description:
The Lava Lamp and Glitter Tube Factory creates dazzling optical effects by reflecting light from glitter and bubbling water. In the glitter tube, glitter is suspended in a thick liquid called glycerine. Each piece of glitter is a tiny mirror that reflects light, and with lots of tiny mirrors, the light is scattered in all directions to create a sparkling effect. In the Lava Lamp, a fizzy chemical reaction between an acid and a base produces bubbles of carbon dioxide gas, creating a spectacular effect that looks just like an underwater volcano.

Contents: A glitter tube filled with glycerine, a glitter tube base and a cap, a lava lamp jar, a lava lamp base and a cap, red colouring, a pipette, sodium bicarbonate, citric acid, glycerine solution, 1 LED flasher, a mould, spoons, stirring stickers, a beaker, a pair of gloves, an instruction sheet and a safety sheet

Buy online at https://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/creativity-music-and-partyware/crafts/wild-science-lava-lamp-and-glitter-tube-factory/p/166045

transcript: Sound Moves. Bluetooth bands. On your hands or feet. An app that makes the selected sounds when you flick the bands. Become a robot. Or play air guitar. Trigger ballet music. Or wicked special effects. Team up and be a pop band. Or mess around. The only limit is your imagination. Sound Moves. Music by.
title: Smyths Toys - Move to your own beat with SoundMoovz as seen on ITV ThisMorning
description:
SoundMoovz lets you make the music! These wearable, motion-activated musical bands fuse music and dance, and using them couldn’t be easier.

Make the beat by dancing instead of dancing to the beat. Move your wrists or ankles to create beats, rhythms and music. Each move you make send a Bluetooth signal to the SoundMoovz App on your smart device, creating amazing sounds. The app features 400 pre-set sounds for you to choose from. Get creative with music inspired by a variety of genres, from pop and rock to jazz and hip hop. Dance to hi-hat shimmers, do the robot to mechanical creaks and perform karate with dramatic karate fight sound effects.

SoundMoovz bring every move you make to life, with zero delay between movement and sound. Each soft rubber band features a Bluetooth radio and an accelerometer, keeping SoundMoovz attuned to how fast you go and how you move—a gentle rocking produces a slower groove than the faster beat you get from breakdancing.

Assign a different sound or instrument to each wearable band to create a slick duet. You can even play your favourite song and layer a sick beat on top using SoundMoovz. Connect multiple bands to one device to make music with up to 4 bands at once and sync with your friends SoundMoovz to layer your beats together. Wear your bands on your wrists, ankles or even shoelaces—the only limit is your imagination. How will you move?

transcript: It's Spin to Sing! The interactive talent show game of winning singing! Start the app, choose a playlist, and get ready to shine! I'm sexy and I know it! Play for laughs with a performance card! Everyone's a star with Spin to Sing's live performance selfies! When the mic stops, it's time to rock! Who's number one? You be the judge! Then play it back with your best moments through the winner's journey! Spin it! Sing it!
title: Smyths Toys - Spin to Sing Game
description:
Spin to Sing Game is the talent show game where the best performer wins! Spin it, sing it and win it! Have you got what it takes to be a Spin to Sing star? Just like your favourite TV talent shows, Spin to Sing is the ultimate family game and allows you to perform live, judge the performances and captures all your best bits with live performance ‘selfies’. Spin the microphone to select a performer who has to sing to one of the tracks on their phone through the free Spin to Sing game app. Whether you’re the next Beyonce, or completely tone-deaf, Spin to Sing is all about who gives the best performance. So show off your dance moves, act silly, or go over the top – whatever it takes to impress your judges! Spin to Sing uses the music you already have downloaded onto your smart phone, so create a playlist at the beginning of the game that all your family and friends will enjoy. Throughout your performance, your fellow players can add a twist to your performance by throwing in a performance card. Cards include ‘sing like a mouse’ ‘rap’ and ‘opera style’ – making for even sillier performances. Each fellow player scores your performance in secret using the five star scoring system on the app, and at the end of the game, the performer with the highest average score wins! The winner is then ‘awarded’ with a ‘Winner’s Journey’ photo montage of all the best bits from their performances– just like a real TV talent show! Players can then share their Winner’s Journey online with family and friends. Smart phone and app required. (Not included)
Buy online at https://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/games-puzzles-and-books/family-board-games/spin-to-sing-game/p/158948

transcript: Enter a 3D world with 3D Maker and 3D Freestyler. With 3D Maker, your ideas come to life. Imagine it and create it. Design, develop, and 3D create. Add amazing details with the 3D Freestyler and go vertical. Create your own 3D worlds. Become a jewelry designer. Bring vehicles and dinosaurs to life. Think it, make it, and have fun. title: Smyths Toys - 3D Magic Maker
description:
3D Magic Maker Under The Sea Set
The 3D Magic Maker Under The Sea Set is a revolutionary toy that allows children to create 3D masterpieces from scratch using gel pens and the UV creation station. Children are able to make their 3D creations in four simple steps.

Step 1: Place coloured UV gel into a mould. Step 2: Place the mould into the UV Creation Station for 10 seconds to cure the ink. Step 3: Take the plastic pieces out of the mould. Step 4: Build a 3D creation by connecting the pieces together, using the gel as glue.

The opportunities are endless with the 3D Maker. Each set comes with a selection of moulds to help children create anything from a sea horse to a colourful turtle. But the fun doesn’t finish there, children can use their imagination to create anything by simply using household items, use a plastic bottle to design a colourful bracelet or a balloon to create a Christmas tree bauble.

Please note: Sometimes if the gel has been applied too thick it could take a little longer to set in the machine, please place the mould / stencil back into the machine and press the button - when the light goes out the gel should be set. The gel can be placed into the machine as many time as you need.
https://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/creativity-music-and-partyware/crafts/3d-magic-maker-under-the-sea-set/p/146189

3D Maker 3D Freestyler
The 3D Maker 3D Freestyler allows children to design and create bigger than ever before. The 3D Maker 3D Freestyler allows kids to draw 3D model and drawings right in front of their eyes. The UV light magically cures their creations as they draw which means that they can draw in any direction. The 3D Maker 3D Freestyler can also be used with the 3D Maker to create huge 3D creations by connecting designs that have been made in the 3D Maker together. This opens up a whole new world of possibilities and potential 3D creations to create.

transcript: Top Trumps How to Play Any number of people can play Top Trumps. Shuffle and then deal an equal amount of cards to each player. The player to the dealer's left starts by reading out a stat from their top card. The other players then read out the same stat. The player with the best or highest value stat wins and collects the other player players cards. These are put to the bottom of their own cards. It is then the winning players turn again to choose the next stat. The person with all the cards at the end of the game wins.

transcript: Hatch adorable baby Hatchimal cuteness forever with Hatchi Babies! Meet Chipity! With 5 accessories plus an exclusive acorn, you'll never run out of ways to love and care for your new Hatchi Baby!
title: Hatchimals HatchiBabies - Chipadee (Exclusive)- Smyths Toys
description:
New moving eggs! Forever babies! Secret accessories! HatchiBabies have arrived – and they have so many surprises for you!  For the first time ever, you could hatch a boy or a girl! To find out who’s inside, hug, tap, snuggle and pat your HatchiBaby’s egg. When they hear you, they’ll respond with cute sounds! The more you play with these forever babies, the more EGGcited they get! Place the egg on a table and it will really move on its own! When you see rainbow eyes shine through the shell, you’ll know your HatchiBaby is ready to hatch – but they can’t do it without you! Rub the egg to encourage them, and peel back the shell – the secret message inside will reveal if you’ve hatched a hatchiboy or hatchigirl Chipadee! (Don’t forget to fill out the birth certificate!) As you pull out your HatchiBaby, their big colour- changing eyes will tell you how they’re feeling, their beaks will move and they’ll rock back and forth – they come to life! Now you can reach into the shell, lift out the highchair, and peel-to-reveal four hidden interactive accessories: a rattle, bottle, hairbrush, cuddle buddy and exclusive acorn! Use them to feed, burp, tickle and snuggle your baby! The more you play, the more responses you’ll unlock! Teach your baby to talk or play new games like "peek-a-boo!" The best part is: these Hatchimals remain babies forever! Chipadee HatchiBabies are adorable additions to your hatchifamily! Bring home a bouncing HatchiBaby of your very own and discover a whole world of surprises!

Buy online at https://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/fashion-and-dolls/hatchimals/hatchimals-hatchibabies-purple-and-green-speckled-egg/p/167577

transcript: Meccano! Your imagination just got real! I'm Meccanoid G15. You can program my moves. And play them back. I can understand you. Let's confirm! Hi-ya! Hey, hey, keep up! You can rebuild me in just a few days.
title: Smyths Toys - Meccano Meccanoid
description:
Meccano Meccanoid Robot G15 and Meccano Meccanoid Tech Large Robot G15

Meccanoid G15 KS and Meccanoid G15 are your personal robot friends that you get to build using the latest Meccano parts. It is an advanced, yet easy-to-use, open source Robotic Building platform.

The robots use their onboard “Mecca Brain” and voice recognition, say thousands of phrases, tell jokes, offer fun facts, play games and interact with you, initiate conversations and even give you a high- five!

Meccanoid G15KS and Meccanoid G15 feature an easy programming option we call "LIM" - Learned Intelligent Movement, where you program movements and sounds and play it back with a push of a button. It sounds complex, but simplicity is central to the design. So even if you are new to robotics and programming, the Meccanoid features the most innovative and easy programming.

Meccanoid G15 KS and Meccanoid G15 can record and playback animations, process voice recognition, and communicate with smart devices through Bluetooth. With a brand new free app, Meccanoids can be programmed via Motion Capture, where the robots will mimic your moves! You can also use the app to program Meccanoid G15 KS through a “ragdoll” Avatar, where you can record sounds and movements to play with later—and also share with your friends.

And that’s just the beginning! Meccanoid G15 KS and Meccanoid G15 are open source, so you can program them however you like using any code programing existing in the market place today! Data communication protocols will be made openly available.

title: Smyths Toys - Sylvanian Families Forest Nursery,Country Tree School and Nursery Double Decker Bus
description:
Sylvanian Families Forest Nursery

This pretty pink and cream building is the perfect place for your Sylvanian babies to spend their day! Complete with a piano and stool for a lovely sing-song, it also includes toys such as building blocks, a playhouse, a choo-choo train, 8 books, a pencil and even 6 tiaras for dressing up. For your more energetic Sylvanian babies, there's a swing, and they can even climb up on the pink rooftop and pop their heads through the holes in the tree to look at all the beautiful surroundings! Any Sylvanian would be happy as a lark in this lovely nursery environment.

Sylvanian Families Country Tree School

The Country Tree School is such a fun school! Whilst there is a classroom which comes furnished for lessons for up to 6 Sylvanian children, complete with 6 seats and desks, the teacher's desk and whiteboard, there is also a tree to climb in breaktime! A balcony overlooking the beautiful Sylvanian scenery provides the perfect platform for pupils to get inspired for their art lessons or spot some wildlife. For any little star-gazers, there is a telescope fitted to the roof which can also be connected to the tree for a better view. Finally, there is also a bench for your little Sylvanians to relax after many hours practising their sums and ABCs.

Sylvanian Families Nursery Double Decker

Sylvanian babies love to ride along to nursery in the wonderfully bright yellow Double Decker Nursery Bus - they always wave at the friendly Sylvanian residents as they pass on by! Embellished with pretty bunting and decorations, the sturdy Nursery Double Decker Bus has room for up to 13 Sylvanian babies and 1 adult driver. It comes with some interchangeable fittings; a ladder is included for those sitting on the top floor to hop on and off, or the driver can park up and fit the flowery slide to the bus creating a super fun way for the little ones to exit the vehicle! You can even swap the top floor seats for a beach-themed play area to keep your Sylvanian babies entertained on their journeys to and from nursery!

title: Smyths Toys - Sylvanian Families Cosy Cottage and Beechwood Hall
description:
Sylvanian Families Cosy Cottage

The Cosy Cottage is the perfect choice those starting out with Sylvanian Families. With its red roof and beige brick style exterior, this quaint two floor cottage includes a ladder to connect the upstairs and downstairs. As well as coming complete with Freya Chocolate Rabbit Girl and a selection of starter furniture, the set also comes with smaller accessories such as frying plan, fork, dish and omelette. The kitchen furniture includes a kitchen table, bench, two chairs, a coffee table plus a kitchen unit containing an oven and sink, and bedroom furniture such as a bed, mattress and some pretty floral bedding. The panel that divides the two floors is detachable, and doubles as an additional garden area.

http://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/fashion-dolls/c-508/sylvanian-families/p-16699/sylvanian-families-cosy-cottage-starter-home/

Sylvanian Families Beechwood Hall

This luxurious Sylvanian Families house has five rooms spread across two floors. Beechwood Hall comes complete with a reversible floor panel, which can be used to add additional living space, or even create a makeshift garden. Boasting an impressive balcony, this house also has a moveable staircase with 8 balustrades. The unique selling point of Beechwood Hall is that it is connectable to the Cosy Cottage – a first-time buyer favourite amongst Sylvanian Families collectors – making this a great property for those looking to grow their Sylvanian Village. Beechwood Hall has 2 working lights which can be operated individually.

transcript: New adventure camp theme from LEGO Friends. Yeah, Camp Wild Hearts! OK, team, first let's build the obstacle course. Ready, set, go! You're doing great! We're up next for river rafting. Perfect time. Finally, archery. You can do it! Bullseye! We set a team record! What a great day! Camp theme from LEGO Friends. Backgrounds not included.
title: Smyths Toys - LEGO Friends Adventure Camp
description:
LEGO Friends Adventure Camp Tree House 41122
With LEGO Friends Adventure Camp Tree House you can join Emma and Stephanie at the Camp Tree House for a crazy climbing challenge! The Adventure Camp Tree House has a climbing wall, waterfall with turning bridge obstacle, tyre swing and camp base with kitchen. Outdoor accessory elements include a helmet, trophy, flags, fishing rod and a camera. The camp leader, Joy, with her tamed eagle Elvis, will guide you as you scale the climbing wall over the waterfall. Then use your balance to master the turning bridge and reach the treetops. You did it! Now whizz down the slide to catch a fish and cook it in the kitchen for supper with your friends, then tuck up in bed before another adventure tomorrow. The living space opens up and features opening windows, a kitchen with opening cupboard, sofa and stairs to an opening roof space for sleeping. House accessory elements include a book, saucepan, cup, chicken leg, marmalade and a lamp. Includes Stephanie, Emma and Joy the camp leader mini-doll figures in sportswear, plus an eagle and a fox.
http://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/fashion-dolls/c-517/lego-friends/p-16168/lego-friends-adventure-camp-tree-house-41122/

LEGO Friends Adventure Camp Rafting 41121
With LEGO Friends Adventure Camp Rafting you can join Olivia and Andrea on an Adventure Camp excursion to the river for a climbing and rafting challenge. Adventure sports accessory elements include a helmet, 2 life jackets, flags and a trophy. Head to the climbing wall and see how fast you can reach the top, then put on your life jacket and brave the rapids in the boat. Watch out for falling trees and the bear fishing in the river! Did you beat the clock and win the trophy? River bridge area features a rafting boat with seats and oars, buildable bridge with finish clock, falling tree function, climbing wall, campfire and a river rock with checkered flag. Then share stories by the fire and settle down in the tent. Camping area features a buildable plastic fabric tent with 2 beds and a bench with camp signpost. Camping accessory elements include a lamp, a fish, marshmallows, compass, camera and sunglasses. Includes Andrea and Olivia mini-doll figures in sportswear, plus a bear.
http://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/fashion-dolls/c-517/lego-friends/p-16165/lego-friends-adventure-camp-rafting-41121/

LEGO Friends Adventure Camp Archery 41120
With LEGO Friends Adventure Camp Archery you can help Mia win the archery trophy so head down to the range to help polish her skills. Keep practicing until she hits the target every time! Have a sandwich under the shelter for lunch and look out for forest wildlife—a little hedgehog has come to say hello! Then draw the bow again and aim for the apple—are you ready to win the trophy? Accessory elements include a trophy, flag, apple, sandwich, bottle of water, cherries and a barrel with projectiles. Includes a Mia mini-doll figure in sportswear plus a hedgehog.
http://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/fashion-dolls/c-517/lego-friends/p-16166/lego-friends-adventure-camp-archery-41120/

This Play-Doh barber shop set is based on the classic Play-Doh hair growing sets with a cool added surprise: an electric buzzer that makes real buzzing sounds when it touches Play-Doh compound! Give them a trim or shave it all off with the electric buzzer, plastic razor, and kid-friendly plastic scissors. Create a fresh and funky look by adding bows, braids, moustaches, and other accessories with the half-moulds. Use the brush to remove leftover Play-Doh bits from the characters’ heads, then start all over with a new style. There are so many different hairstyles to make again and again! Fingerlings will love twirling on the tea cups and riding the Ferris wheel. This colourful playset comes with Mandy the Fingerlings Baby Monkey and Mel, a mini Unicorn.

Mandy responds to sound, touch and motion with sweet monkey babble and cute animations. She loves hanging from your fingers and interacting with you as you play. Expressive blinks, head turns and monkey chatter let you know how Mandy is feeling…and she’s always happy to be at the fun fair!

Help Mandy and Mel pick their favourite gondola, and turn the handle to give them a spin in the Ferris wheel. Ready to try a new ride? Mandy loves hanging from the flagpole rope and spinning in the teacups—and the little cups are sized just right for Mel.

title: Smyths Toys - LeapFrog Count Along Till
description:

Press a button to hear the name and colour of the food, a verse of a shopping song and fun sounds like the crunching of egg shells followed by "Oops, guess we'll make an omelette!" Press the number buttons 1-10 to hear the numbers and a counting song.

Play with the Count Along Till as the cashier or the shopper. Swipe items across a scanner that really beeps, then push the total button to hear the number of coins to insert. title: Smyths Toys - Boombot The Extreme Humanoid Robot
description:
Boombot is the all new rough and touch robotic buddy that will not only protect your room against intruders, but he can dance, beatbox and throw punches too! He'll even fart and laugh at his own farts. With over 60 interactive responses across 6 different game modes, Boombot is the ultimate new interactive robotic toy.

In Rumble mode you can get Boombot ready for the fight by punching him in his chest plate. Boombot will get up, pound his hands on the ground, get angry and throw some punches at you. In Boxing mode press and hold the punch button and Boombot will throw punches and his eyes will turn blue. In Handstand mode, place Boombot upside down and his eyes will turn purple and he will perform a back flip. In Tarzan mode, you can pick Boombot up and he will swing and do a front summersault. In Boogie mode, give Boombot a hi-5 and he will dance and also beatbox. Once he is tired out, in Zen Mode Boombot will fall asleep and snore. But you can wake him up by tickling his feet.

Stop intruders from invading your private space by setting Boombot in Room Guard Mode. His sensors will pick up any trespassers and he will scare them away by shouting, pounding his arms loudly on the ground! Boombot, the ultimate rough and tough robotic buddy, with over 60 interactive responses across 6 different modes.

Buy online at http://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/construction-cars/c-416/robots/p-18949/boombot-the-extreme-humanoid-robot/

description:

 Diner Set 
The Our Generation Retro Bite to Eat Diner is the perfect addition to your Our Generation collection. This jam packed, funky retro diner has all you need for hours of fun. One strawberry milkshake! Coming right up!

Realistic and authentic features such as the neon lights around the diner add to the retro feel. Stick some tunes on the jukebox to get the retro vibes going. Pick from 6 classic songs. Write up today’s specials for your customers on the chalk board. Fill up your cake display stand with all your yummy desserts so customers can spin it around and see what takes their fancy. Pull up the table so you are ready for the morning rush. Then it’s time to open the shutters to let people know you are open for business.

- Retro Car - 
Turn heads in this realistic Our Generation Retro Car that features a stylish interior and vintage looking finish. Blast tunes from the cool FM radio that plays 4 different songs and see the dashboard light up as you cruise around with your Our Generation doll at the wheel. This brightly coloured retro car has a trunk for storing luggage (sold separately) and a cool chrome-style engine underneath the lift-up hood! For long cross-country trips attach the R.V. Camper (sold separately) to the trailer hitch at the rear of the car. Fits 45cm dolls. Dolls and accessories sold separately.

- Retro Doll Rose - 
Meet Rose! Take your child’s imagination a step back in time with this Our Generation Retro Doll. This 50s-inspired doll is dressed in a retro red and white polka dot dress and scarf with matching red cardigan, belt and ballet flats.

transcript: Project MC Squared. H2O RC car. What makes it go? Water power. H2O. Lights on. Picking up steam. H2O RC car on the scene. Project MC Squared RC car. Batteries not included. Dull solution.
title: Smyths Toys - Project Mc2 H2O Radio Controlled Car
description:
Just like in the Netflix original series, this cool ride is really powered by S.T.E.A.M. - Science, Technology, Engineering, Art & maths! Pop the hood to connect the engine. Add H2O (that's water!) to the tank to activate and run the car. Headlights turn on, and real, cool steam comes out of the tailpipes! Manoeuvre this sporty, red car using the easy-to-use remote control.

Picking Up S.T.E.A.M! Water has two jobs here. First, adding it into your RC car turns it on. The water completes an electrical circuit and allows electricity to flow from the battery to the motor. Second, it creates the mist that looks like the car’s exhaust. The mist is made from millions of tiny water droplets. Splashing around a pool creates lots of large droplets, but if you could do this ultra-fast, you would form ultra-tiny water droplets. The same thing happens in your RC car. A small plate vibrates super-fast to make millions of tiny water droplets that form the car ‘exhaust’.

Buy online at https://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/fashion-and-dolls/other-fashion-and-dolls/project-mc2-h2o-radio-controlled-car/p/153772

title: LEGO 75954 Harry Potter Hogwarts Great Hall Toy- Smyths Toys
description:
Build a magical adventure with the LEGO 75954 Harry Potter Hogwarts Great Hall. This beautifully detailed hall captures all the excitement of the legendary School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

This 878 piece build is packed with role-playing elements to bring the world of Harry Potter to life. 10 minifigures, magical artefacts and fantastic creatures set the scene for all your favourite Hogwarts adventures.

Ready the boat and help the students make their way to the hall for their first day at Hogwarts, before holding your own Sorting Ceremony with the Sorting Hat and the food-laden tables. Will it be Gryffindor, Ravenclaw, Slytherin or Hufflepuff? At the end of the year, you can use the reversible banners to reveal the winner of the House Cup.

The LEGO 75954 Harry Potter Hogwarts Great Hall features a 4-level tower just off the Great Hall. Who knows what secrets await inside? Climb the Grand Staircase that can be moved to change your path, just like in the movies.

Set up the potions class in one of the tower rooms, or stand before the Mirror of Erised in the turret to reveal what your heart desires, choosing from 4 reflections to show in the mirror. Help Harry to face down Professor Quirrell, whose head rotates to reveal the face of Lord Voldemort. The LEGO 75954 Harry Potter Hogwarts Great Hall even comes with a buildable Basilisk and Fawkes, so you can recreate the dramatic battle from Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.

Join Harry, Hermione, Ron and more of your favourite characters on their adventures in the Great Hall and beyond with this enchanting build.

title: Smyths Toys - Aquabeads
description:
Aquabeads Rainbow Pen Set comes with two layout trays and a bespoke workstation making it perfect for crafting more Aquabeads creations at once. Slot the amazing coloured beads into the Aquabeads Rainbow Pen and easily switch between the colours when creating your colourful designs. With over 600 beads that come in 8 different colours the creative possibilities are endless! There are 4 templates to help give you creative inspiration and the handy workstation will help to keep you organised.

New to the wonderful world of Aqua beads? Then the Beginner’s Studio is the perfect set for you.Arrange the beads on the template and spray with water to create beautiful Aqua beads creations. Complete with over 800 beads in 12 colours, the only limit is your imagination. The Beginner’s Studio comes with a super cute shooting star-shaped bead storage case, a sprayer to set your beads, a super handy bead pen to help you arrange them, and 4 template sheets for plenty of creative inspiration. As an extra bonus the Beginner’s Studio case fits into the artist’s carry case. Start getting artistic and creating beady masterpieces with the Aqua beads Beginner’s Studio today. This set comes with a beautiful bead case, making it perfect for using again and again with refill bead sets.
The Aquabeads Artists Carry Case is perfect for expert aqua beaders who want to keep creating beautiful aqua beads masterpieces whilst on holiday or at friend’s houses . The portable set comes with the amazing rainbow pen dispenser which allows you to switch easily between colours when making your designs. Containing over 1,200 beads in an attractive colour palette storage station, the creative possibilities are endless. With beads in 16 different colours, this is the ultimate aqua beads set for a budding artist. There are also 6 template sheets to give you creative inspiration for your designs. As an extra little bonus this set also connects with The Beginner’s Studio, letting you use your aqua beads products together. Complete with a mini carry set, this is just the set for aqua beading on the move. There's even a special bead layout area to make your creations extra special.

Create your very own sea creatures with Aquabeads Sea Life Set. Use the bright colourful beads that come in 9 different colours to create Aquabeads marine life. There are 4 pretty template sheets included to help you make your sea creature friends, including a dolphin, seahorse, penguin and even an octopus.

- It's truly an interactive dinosaur experience.

description:

Stream and record your flight in high-definition with the Sky Viper Streaming Drone with FPV! This technologically advanced drone is fitted with a HD camera so you can stream spectacular footage directly to a smartphone (device not included).

Put on the included FPV headset and pilot your drone as though you’re on board, from first person view! Simply insert your smartphone into the headset to see a live stream of video from your flight right before your eyes. See like never before with first person view.

Capture the perfect shot with the Sky Viper Streaming Drone with FPV.

The rules of play are simple and are a delightful twist on the traditional game of Hide and Seek. Close your eyes while your friend carefully hides Sherlock. transcript: When the arguments start, and they always do, I train my cat to jump on the board and add to the chaos. Then I swipe a couple hundreds from the bank. title: Smyths Toys - Monopoly Cheater Game
description:
Do your Monopoly games usually end in rows over a player trying to cheat? Now we have the game for you. Monopoly Cheater Game actually encourages you to try and cheat your way to winning. description:
Introducing a modern banking version of the Monopoly game: the Ultimate Banking Edition. In this edition, Monopoly money is no more! The Monopoly Ultimate Banking game features an all-in-one Ultimate Banking unit with touch technology that makes the game fast and fun. Now players can instantly buy properties, set rent, and tap their way to fortune. Each player gets a bankcard and the Ultimate Banking unit keeps track of everyone's fortunes. It also scans the game's property cards and can boost or crash the market. Traditional Monopoly play gets amped up with this edition -- the game introduces Event cards and Location spaces instead of Chance cards and Community Chest cards. Land on an Event Space, and rents may be raised or lowered, a player may earn or lose money, or someone could get sent to Jail. Location Spaces allow players to pay and move to any property space on the gameboard. Challenge friends and family to win it all with the Monopoly Ultimate Banking game!

Cuddle up to a snoozy sloth with over 40 fun reactions! Fingerlings Hugs are super soft and so very snuggly.

With long arms perfect for big hugs, Kingsley is one cuddly climber. He might never want to let you go! Fingerlings Hugs can say and do over 40 things, from giving kisses to remixing your words.

Swing him, cuddle him and rock him to sleep: Kingsley is just the silly sloth for playtime fun. Press and hold his left ear to record what you say. When you let go, Kingsley repeats what you said in a funny new way. Throw him in the air or swing him down low for a goofy remix!

Fingerlings Hugs are full of fun reactions. Tickle Kingsley for giggles and laughs, and give him a shake to hear funny farts. Press his mouth to your skin to get a kiss: the longer you hold, the longer the kiss!

Velcro strips on Kingsley’s paws let you wrap his arms into cute poses for more ways to play.

Fingerlings Hugs are also available in pink monkey (Ref: 166454) and blue monkey (Ref: 166455) designs.

Buy online at https://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/fashion-and-dolls/fingerlings/fingerlings-hugs-sloth/p/166452

transcript: Disney's Game of Hidden Pictures! I found it! Hunt for magical treasure through the world of Disney! Search through Radiator Springs, Arendelle and Neverland! I found it! title: Smyths Toys - Ravensburger Disney Eye Found It Hidden Picture Game
description:
Join Mickey Mouse and friends with Disney Eye Found It Hidden Picture Game on an exciting race through 12 different Disney realms, from Radiator Springs to Peter Pan's Never Land and Pooh's Hundred Acre Wood. Along the way everyone searches for hidden iconic Disney objects. There are over 1000 things to find! With the help of fellow players, race to Cinderella's castle at the end of the giant 6-foot game board before the hands of the clock reach midnight.

Set the clock to 1:00. Once the game starts the clock is ticking and players must work together to get to Cinderella’s castle before the clock strikes midnight. On your turn spin the spinner and either move, search, or tick the clock forward. If you spin the golden Mickey Mouse ear it’s time to search! Flip over a Search Card and everyone starts looking for the item on the card. For each item a player finds that is one step forward for all players. If all players arrive at the castle before the clock strikes midnight everyone wins!

Buy online at https://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/games-puzzles-and-books/childrens-board-games/ravensburger-disney-eye-found-it-hidden-picture-game/p/136543
